class.name: NDIOutput
class.brief_description: Transmit the [Viewport] as a NDI source
class.description: Creates an NDI source and displays the closest [Viewport] up the tree. [b]Warning:[/b] Outputting more than 60 FPS will cause stuttering. Limit the FPS by setting [param application/run/max_fps] in [ProjectSettings]. If the [Viewport] should be transmitted while its not visible, for example when the window is in the background or a [SubViewport] is used without a [SubViewportContainer], make sure to have the [param render_target_update_mode] set to [code]Always[/code] on the [SubViewport].

members.member: The name of the NDI source.
List of groups that the source will be available in. Leave empty for default.
Which Audio Bus to transmit. [b]Warning[/b]: Selected Bus has to have a [code]Capture[/code] effect added and enabled.

Makes the [NDIOutput] Node transmit while running in the Editor. Source name will be suffixed with [code][Editor][/code]. [b]Warning:[/b] Enable [code]Update Continuously[/code] in the Editor Settings to prevent excessive stuttering.
